thread.title: The Republicans' Mr. Congeniality drops out of speaker race
thread.title_full: The Republicans' Mr. Congeniality drops out of speaker race

title: The Republicans' Mr. Congeniality drops out of speaker race
text:
> Top News The Republicans' Mr. Congeniality drops out of speaker race House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy of Calif. speaks to the media about his decision not to run for nomination for House Speaker replacing John Boehner, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, on Capitol Hill in Washington. In a stunning move, McCarthy withdrew his candidacy for House speaker Thursday, throwing Congress' Republican leadership into chaos. (AP Photo/Jacquelyn Martin) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
